Furniture_Vnp_Bthunder_description
バンピートロットに登場する二足歩行型の乗り物、トロットビークルのフィギュア。トロット楽団のフェンネルが搭乗する機体。[#Legal]
An action figure modeled on Blue Thunder, a bipedal vehicle (or Trotmobile) operated by Fennel, guitarist of the Garland Globetrotters.[#Legal]
Une figurine inspirée de Blue Thunder, un véhicule bipède (ou Trotmobile) conduit par Fennel, guitariste des Garland Globetrotters.[#Legal]
Eine Action-Figur, welche Blue Thunder, einem bipedalen Fahrzeug (oder Tretmobil), das von Fennel (Gitarrist der Garland Globetrotters) gesteuert benutzt wird, entworfen wurde.[#Legal]
Action figure che raffigura Blue Thunder, un veicolo bipede (detto anche Trotmobile) guidata da Fennel, il chitarrista dei Garland Globetrotters.[#Legal]
Un muñeco en miniatura que representa a Blue Thunder, el vehículo a pedales (o Trotmobile) que maneja Fennel, el héroe de Garland Globetrotters.[#Legal]
범피트롯에 등장하는 2족보행형 이동수단, 트롯 비클 피규어. 트롯 악단의 펜넬이 탑승하는 기체. [#Legal]
Figurine of a Trotmobile, the bipedal vehicle from BUMPY TROT. Piloted by Fennel of the Trot Band.[#Legal]
出現在BUMPY TROT裡的雙腳步行式的機器車Trotmobile的模型。Trot Band裡的Fennel所搭乘的機型。[#Legal]
出現在BUMPY TROT裡的雙腳步行式的機器車Trotmobile的模型。Trot Band裡的Fennel所搭乘的機型。[#Legal]
An action figure modeled on Blue Thunder, a bipedal vehicle (or Trotmobile) operated by Fennel, guitarist of the Garland Globetrotters.[#Legal]
